newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Bulgaria sells 31.56 bln levs 1- and 4-wk T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Bulgaria sells 31.56 bln levs 1- and 4-wk T-bills.

text.p: Bulgaria's Finance Ministry on Wednesday sold two discount T-bill issues with maturities of one week and four weeks, yielding 3.83 percent and 17.69 percent to maturity, respectively, the central bank said.
Bids were received for a total of 32.26 billion levs of T-bills but the ministry approved bids for 31.56 billion levs worth of paper.
The issues were offered with no par value or minimum acceptable price set in advance by the ministry. Auction date and maturity date for each issue overlap.
Details of the issues follow. Prices are in percent of par: Issue number BG3022097003 BG3022197001
Bids received 16,493.6 million levs 15 766.6 million levs
Bids approved 16,443.6 million levs 15,116.6 million levs
Avg yield to maturity 3.83 pct 17.69 pct
